StartDate.description: The start date of the period

StartTimestamp.description: The start timestamp of the period (intra day readings)

EndDate.description: The end date of the period

EndTimestamp.description: The end timestamp of the period (intra day readings)

PeriodDuration.description: The duration of the full set of periods where this period instance is contained

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
